text: Bonner County is a county in the northern part of the U.S. state of Idaho. As of the 2020 census, 47,110 people lived there. The county seat and largest city is Sandpoint. == Communities == === Cities === * Sandpoint * Clark Fork * Dover * East Hope * Hope * Kootenai * Oldtown * Ponderay * Priest River === Census-designated place === * Blanchard === Unincorporated communities === * Careywood * Cocolalla * Colburn * Coolin * Laclede * Lamb Creek * Nordman * Outlet Bay * Sagle * Vans Corner * Westmond == References == Category:1900s establishments in Idaho Category:1907 establishments in the United States Category:Idaho counties
title: Bonner County, Idaho
